title: Can't play because of Bug Splat
body: After champ select the game bugsplats and no matter what I do it wont let me into the game. Help

replies.body:
Did you make any changes to your setup lately? A new video card or Monitor? If not, then this is likely caused by the more common culprits of Bugsplats such as Display Driver or Hardware issues. I strongly recommend you go through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most frequent causes for this.

Let me know if this resolved your issue or not.
